long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a floating notepad extension that creates a window that is able to be edited, making it easy to jot down notes, keep references handy, or draft ideas. All while browsing. Create a movable, resizable window that can be opened in any tab, it can be used to draft ideas, add image references and boost productivity. Your content is automatically saved and synced, so no fear of losing your jots in other tabs. The extension makes the opening process quick and accessible,  just in a click of a button. Key features include a dark/light mode toggle, drag-and-drop to add images, customizable fonts, and a convenient clear button to start fresh.
